alert.note: Alert for West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 4:38PM PST until January 12 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, Ashford, Randle, and Packwood. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
